name: Antolia
description:
Darkness has been brought to the seven temples. It's up to Arin to bring light back to them.  Journey through this zelda-like game using a variety of tools to solve puzzles and defeat bosses.  Relight the lamps so that the temples can shine.

Controls
movement - wasd
Attack - J
submit - K
use item - I
select items 1-9 (only one item so far) (just press 1 when you get the big chest)

This prototype is one month worth of pixeling and programming.  I plan on fixing bugs especially the collision bug with the enemies.  In the future I will make ore dungeons and maybe expand the one in the game.  Also, there will be more puzzles and items.
